definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb
thick paste of fermented soybean/marinated in soy paste/paste/jam

sentences.english: Put sesame paste in a bowl, mix 2tbsp cool boiled water to mix well.
sentences.chinese: 芝麻酱放在碗里，加凉开水50克调匀。

sentences.english: Boiled egg, Fried eggplant, Tomato, Cucumber, Coriander, Tahini.
sentences.chinese: 煮蛋，炸茄子，西红柿，酸黄瓜，调味芝麻酱。

sentences.english: Or, you can add Chinese chili sauce or sesame sauce to vary the flavor.
sentences.chinese: 另外，你也可以选择加上中式辣酱或芝麻酱调味。

sentences.english: Small felafels with tahini sauce and vegetable salad.
sentences.chinese: 埃及炸豆泥，配白芝麻酱和蔬菜沙拉。

sentences.english: Tahini is a paste of ground sesame seeds and is available from most health food stores.
sentences.chinese: 芝麻酱是一个地面芝麻糊，在最健康食品商店有卖的。

sentences.english: Serve broccoli and chickpeas with tahini sauce drizzled over the top.
sentences.chinese: 在西兰花和鹰嘴豆上面淋上芝麻酱调料。

definition: noodles served with soy sauce/sesame butter etc
zha jiang mian: ground pork simmered with salty fermented soybean paste (or other sauce) over thick wheat noodles
